1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
3
4-- | Data structure for mapping relation to judges
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Assert
7  ( -- * Data type
8    Assert' (..),
9  
10    -- * Short assertion
11    ShortAssert', ShortAsserts',
12    assertNormal, assertViolated,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base           as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax         as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data           as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap    as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap    as C
20
21
22-- ----------------------  Assert
23
24-- | Affirming or denying relation.
25--   It consists of logical quality, judgement pattern, and relmap.
26--   See also 'B.Judge'
27data Assert' h c = Assert
28    { assSection   :: C.SecNo                -- ^ Section number
29    , assType      :: D.AssertType           -- ^ Logical quality
30    , assClass     :: D.JudgeClass           -- ^ Judgement class
31    , assToken     :: [S.Token]              -- ^ Source token list
32    , assPara      :: C.TTreePara
33    , assRelmap    :: Maybe (C.Relmap' h c)  -- ^ Relmap
34    , assLinks     :: C.RelmapLinkTable' h c
35    } deriving (Show)
36
37instance B.CodePtr (Assert' h c) where
38    codePtList = concatMap B.codePtList . assToken
39
40
41-- ----------------------  Short assertion
42
43-- | Assertion with short signs.
44type ShortAssert' h c = S.Short (Assert' h c)
45
46-- | Assertion list with short signs.
47type ShortAsserts' h c = S.Short [Assert' h c]
48
49-- | Select affirmative or denial assertions.
50assertNormal :: B.Map [ShortAssert' h c]
51assertNormal = B.omit violated
52
53-- | Select violated assertions.
54assertViolated :: B.Map [ShortAssert' h c]
55assertViolated = filter violated
56
57violated :: ShortAssert' h c -> Bool
58violated = (== D.AssertViolate) . assType . S.shortBody
59
